name: Parabill
short_description:
ParaBill is the first commercially available Open Source Billing and Customer Care system that supports traditional Telecom and Communication Services as well as content based charging.

The solution has advanced features for managing:

* charging and rating of any event such as CDRs from telecom switches, 
* administrating products and services in an advanced product hierarchy, 
* administrating usage and non usage prices in an advanced and flexible structure, 
* administrating customers and subscriptions. 
* generate Statements as bases for invoicing.

The functionality is built on yaers of experience of numerous Billing and Customer Care solutions for the telecom industry. Both fixed and mobile services.
summary: Subscription management, charging and billing system for all services
